notes: Very modern studio apartment in excellent condition with contemporary fixtures, recessed lighting, and quality finishes. Large floor-to-ceiling windows provide good natural light. For baby safety, the open layout with hard tile floors and sharp-cornered furniture (coffee table, dining table) would need childproofing; no visible balcony railings or stairs in photos. The compact kitchenette has accessible appliances and electrical outlets at low height that would need covers.
